title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Enhancing Job-Related Mathematics Skills through Program-Based Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math skills and specialized knowledge in specific fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can build math project evaluation systems applying the four-stage program-based assessment design (assessment-contextualization-prioritization-justification)
Learners can write project reports solving practical problems using ≥5 digital tools that assess complex competencies
Learners can develop assessment plans in collaboration with key stakeholders (team leaders, peers, HRD officers) based on assessment environment analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
